data.chText: 包含；需要；使成为必然部分（或结果）
data.enText: if a situation, an event or an activity involves sth, that thing is an important or necessary part or result of it

data.chText: 任何投资都有一定的风险。
data.enText: Any investment involves an element of risk.

data.chText: 许多罪案都与毒品有关。
data.enText: Many of the crimes involved drugs.

data.chText: 考试将包括回答一些关于一张照片的问题。
data.enText: The test will involve answering questions about a photograph.

data.chText: 这份工作需要我在全国各地跑。
data.enText: The job involves me travelling all over the country.

data.chText: 这份工作需要我在全国各地跑。
data.enText: The job involves my travelling all over the country.
if a situation, an event or an activity involves sb, they take part in it or are affected by it

data.chText: 有一起涉及一群年轻人的严重事件。
data.enText: There was a serious incident involving a group of youths.

data.chText: 这次撞车事故涉及多少辆汽车？
data.enText: How many vehicles were involved in the crash?
to make sb take part in sth

data.chText: 我们希望参加庆典的人越多越好。
data.enText: We want to involve as many people as possible in the celebrations.

data.chText: 父母应当参与孩子的教育。
data.enText: Parents should involve themselves in their child's education.

data.chText: 表明（某人参与了犯罪等）
data.enText: to say or do sth to show that sb took part in sth, especially a crime

data.chText: 他的自白供出其他一些政治人物也涉及此事。
data.enText: His confession involved a number of other politicians in the affair.
involve sb in sth

data.chText: 把某人牵涉（或牵扯）到某事里
data.enText: to make sb experience sth, especially sth unpleasant

data.chText: 你害得我添了一大堆额外的工作。
data.enText: You have involved me in a great deal of extra work.

simple_means.memory_skill: in 进入 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转进去 → 卷入

means: 使成为必然部分(或结果)

ex.enText: This car can hold four people.
How much water does this bottle hold?

synonyms.bx: 指容纳某一数量的人或事物，强调包容的能力。

ex.enText: What is contained in the bottle?

ex.chText: 这个书架上现在有60本书，但它能装下150本。
ex.enText: This bookshelf currently contains 60 books but can hold 150 ones.

ex.chText: 这份报告包含你所需的一切数据。
ex.enText: This report contains all the data you need.

synonyms.bx: 指容器装有具体东西，含仍有剩余空间之意；也指包含具体之物或数据、信息等。

ex.chText: 这辆新车包含了许多改进。
ex.enText: The new car embodies many improvements.

ex.chText: 那项提案包含在决议草案中吗？
ex.enText: Has the proposal been embodied in that draft resolution?

synonyms.bx: 指包含某些内容，而这些内容是某事物的组成部分。

ex.chText: 自然科学包括许多学科。
该理论涉及心理学的不同方面。
ex.enText: This theory embraces different aspects of psychology.

synonyms.bx: 指包含和整体有关的细节。

ex.chText: 她的作品包括小说和散文。
ex.enText: Her writings include novels and prose.

synonyms.bx: 指包括属于整体的部分，可以是具体的或抽象的。

ex.chText: 新员工们需要知道这份工作包括什么。
ex.enText: New employees need to know what the job will involve.

ex.chText: 考试将包括朗读一则新闻。
ex.enText: The test will involve reading a piece of news.

ex.chText: 她没想到写一部小说需要做这么多的工作。
ex.enText: She didn't realize writing a novel involved so much work.

synonyms.bx: 指必然包括某种结果，所接的事物通常是抽象的。

data.enText: involve sb in sth

data.chText: 把某人牵涉（或牵扯）到某事里
data.enText: to make sb experience sth, especially sth unpleasant

data.chText: 你害得我添了一大堆额外的工作。
data.enText: You have involved me in a great deal of extra work.

tr: make complex or intricate or complicated
occupy or engage the interest of
example: His story completely involved me during the entire afternoon

tr: require as useful, just, or proper
example: It takes nerve to do what she did
This job asks a lot of patience and skill
This position demands a lot of personal sacrifice
This dinner calls for a spectacular dessert
This intervention does not postulate a patient's consent
Dinner at Joe's always involves at least six courses
This new ruling affects your business
Don't involve me in your family affairs!

value.def: If a situation or activity involves something, that thing is a necessary part or consequence of it.

example.ex: Running a kitchen involves a great deal of discipline and speed...
example.tran: 料理好厨房需要把一切都安排得规规矩矩，且要讲求速度。

example.ex: Nicky's job as a public relations director involves spending quite a lot of time with other people.
example.tran: 尼基作为公共关系主管，需要花很多时间与别人打交道。

value.def: If a situation or activity involves someone, they are taking part in it.

example.ex: If there was a cover-up, it involved people at the very highest levels of government.
example.tran: 如果有人想要隐瞒实情,那其中就涉及政府部门最高层的人物。
有 100 名囚犯参与的暴动

example.ex: Detectives launched an operation involving Interpol and Nigerian police.
example.tran: 侦探们联合国际刑警与尼日利亚警方开展了一项行动。

value.def: If you say that someone involves themselves in something, you mean that they take part in it, often in a way that is unnecessary or unwanted.

example.ex: I seem to have involved myself in something I don't understand.
example.tran: 我似乎卷入了一件我并不知情的事情当中。

value.def: If you involve someone else in something, you get them to take part in it.

example.ex: Noel and I do everything together, he involves me in everything...
example.tran: 我和诺埃尔什么事情都一起做,他让我参与所有的事。

example.ex: Before too long he started involving me in the more confidential aspects of the job.
example.tran: 不久,他便开始让我介入工作中更机密的方面。

value.def: If one thing involves you in another thing, especially something unpleasant or inconvenient, the first thing causes you to do or deal with the second.

example.ex: A late booking may involve you in extra cost...
example.tran: 预订晚了的话你可能要额外多花钱。

example.ex: This involved me in a round trip of over 400 miles.
example.tran: 为此我需要往返旅行 400 多英里。

trans: 包含；包括；涉及；牵连；牵涉

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to roll, to turn 卷, 转
rootsaffixes.title: vol, volu, volv, volt

partsOfSpeech.dec: archi〔= arch 弧形〕+ volt 卷，转 → 转成弧形 → 拱门装饰
con 共同 + volv 卷，转 + e → 共同转 → 缠绕
e 出 + volu 卷，转 + tion 表名词 → 进化
evolution 进化 + ism 学术 → 进化论
e 出 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转出来 → 进化
inter 在…之间 + volv 卷，转 + e → 在两者之间转 → 缠绕
in 进入 + volv 卷，转 + e → 转进去 → 卷入
re 相反 + volt 转 → 反转 → 叛变
re 相反 + volu 卷，转 + tion 表名词 → 革命
re 一再 + volv 卷，转 + e → 一再转 → 旋转
re 重新 + volv 卷，转 + er 表物 → 旋转连发 → 左轮手枪
volu 卷，转 + ble → 不断流转的 → 话语不断的
vol 卷，转 + ume → 装订成卷 → 卷，册
